page.title: 02Boskenwyn C.P.School
page.content: { {Description of our classroom. Part of our school is a mobile classroom. It is a middle size classroom. It is green with black wood around the bottom and there is one cloak room.There is one firedoor and one stock cupboard. It has got nine windows in the classroom and in the cloak room there are five windows. And there is one firstaid cabinet. We have got some steps leading up to the cloakroom.There is one sink which is small.The classroom has two bins.There is one large blackboard.{ { {
